name: Charlie's Delivery
description:
This is the first game of Charlie's Delivery Series.
This game includes love, peace, environment, science, dreams, friendship, ambition, passion and NO SAVE.
TRY IT NOW!


Gameplay:


-Objective-
Charlie, who runs a delivery business, should deliver the box received from the customer safely to the destination.
It won't be an easy delivery, but gamers will be able to help Charlie get to the destination with their superior control


-Simple controller-
You can use only left and right movement keys, jump key, and missile launch key(specific sections)


-No save-
If you fall into a trap or hit something, you return to the starting position.
This requires careful play at every moment.
